entry.title: New release for ZTNET: v0.6.9
entry.content:
Release Notes

🛡️ Ztnet

  • Bugfix Environment OauthExlusiveLogin (#481)
  • Azure AD Oauth Authentication (#483)

📝 Documentation

  • Azure AD Oauth Authentication (#483)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sinamics/ztnet/compare/v0.6.8...0.6.9

Documentation

https://ztnet.network

Contributors to this release: No contributors 🎉

entry.title: New release for ZTNET: v0.6.10
entry.content:
Release Notes

🛡️ Ztnet

  • Disable OAuth signup when user registration is turned off (#484)
  • Fixed organization user API endpoint name (#490)
  • Added missing values from organization - members api (#491)
  • Fix for setting correct pagesize when selected "show all" in pagination. (#494)
  • Moved "Created" collumn to member Modal (#495)
  • Added translations to public auth pages (#496)
  • Replace custom locale middleware with nextjs i18n redirects (#498)
  • Fixed members table sorting icon alignment (#501)
  • Improved network options modal (#502)
  • Bump axios from 1.6.2 to 1.7.4 (#499)
  • Implemented a web app manifest file to enable 'Add to Home Screen' functionality (#504)
  • Open the joinzt site when clicking the qrcode (#505)

📝 Documentation

  • Fixed organization user API endpoint name (#490)
  • Added missing values from organization - members api (#491)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sinamics/ztnet/compare/v0.6.9...0.6.10

Documentation

https://ztnet.network

Contributors to this release: @dependabot and @dependabot[bot] 🎉

entry.title: New release for ZTNET: v0.7.0
entry.content:
Release Notes

Email Templates Overhaul

We've completely revamped our email templates system to enhance functionality and user experience. Please note the following important changes:

  1. Custom Template Reset: Due to this update, all custom templates will be deleted.

  2. Action Required: If you've customized any templates, please copy your content before updating.

  3. Restoring Customized Templates:

  4. Upon initial load, templates may appear empty after a brief loading period.
  5. To restore a template: a. Click the "Reset" button to load the default version. b. Make your changes if any. c. Click "Save" to preserve your changes.

New user device tracking.

You can now view a list of all devices that have accessed your account. You'll get a notification when: - A new device logs into your account - An existing device logs in from a new IP address

You can turn off these notifications in your user settings page. Important: You'll need to login again after the update due to these changes.

🛡️ Ztnet

  • Allow top level dns domains (#507)
  • Update the db member online status (#509)
  • Improved Polish translations (#511)
  • Added login page title (#513)
  • Added network description and authorId to api response (#515)
  • Use browser native datepicker for user expire time (#517)
  • Add active devices list with logout functionality (#512)
  • Improved Polish translations (#519)
  • New notification page in user-settings (#520)
  • Improved Polish translations (#521)
  • Added user email verification (#522)
  • Email templates bugfix (#528)
  • Allow ipv6 and ipv4 in member options modal (#529)
  • Improved device id hash generation (#530)
  • Add Timeago and Online status for devices (#534)
  • Improved Polish translations (#533)
  • New auth wrapper for api endpoints (#535)
  • Improved tests files (#536)
  • Set user device cookie maxAge to 1 year (#537)
  • Implemented Zod schemas for improved API input validation (#538)

📝 Documentation

  • Added network description and authorId to api response (#515)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sinamics/ztnet/compare/v0.6.10...0.6.11

Documentation

https://ztnet.network

Contributors to this release: @tinola 🎉

entry.title: New release for ZTNET: v0.7.1
entry.content:
Release Notes

🛡️ Ztnet

  • Allow for non-standard Postgres port to be used (#544)
  • Return node data from controller as first priority. (#548)
  • Don't send auth when both user and pass are empty (#566)
  • Add Russian Language Support (#562)
  • Update linux.md (#577)
  • Improved smtp mail handler (#582)

📝 Documentation

  • Update linux.md (#577)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sinamics/ztnet/compare/v0.7.0...0.7.1

Documentation

https://ztnet.network

Contributors to this release: @antoniomika, @marat2509, @owopeachy and @starlightcrafted 🎉

entry.title: New release for ZTNET: v0.7.2
entry.content:
Release Notes

🛡️ Ztnet

  • Fixed typo in en/"privateCardContent" (#583)
  • fix: Correct the reboot command on Windows (#591)
  • Update zerotier to 1.14.2 (#592)
  • Bump cookie from 0.6.0 to 0.7.0 (#568)
  • Updated docs for keycloak oauth (#601)
  • Fix missing translations (#599)
  • Added email verification icon and lastseen to admin user-table. (#604)
  • Update common.json (#606)
  • Improved global node naming (#607)
  • Bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.17.0 to 0.31.0 in /ztnodeid (#602)
  • Added option to set sitename in admin panel (#605)

📝 Documentation

  • fix: Correct the reboot command on Windows (#591)
  • Update zerotier to 1.14.2 (#592)
  • Bump http-proxy-middleware from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 in /docs (#575)
  • Bump elliptic from 6.5.4 to 6.6.0 in /docs (#578)
  • Bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.6 in /docs (#594)
  • Bump send and express in /docs (#595)
  • Bump serve-static and express in /docs (#596)
  • Bump express from 4.18.2 to 4.21.2 in /docs (#597)
  • Bump cookie and express in /docs (#569)
  • Bump webpack from 5.89.0 to 5.97.1 in /docs (#598)
  • Updated docs for keycloak oauth (#601)
  • Added option to set sitename in admin panel (#605)

📦 Installer

  • Bump serve-static and express in /install.ztnet (#574)
  • Bump send and express in /install.ztnet (#572)
  • Bump path-to-regexp and express in /install.ztnet (#573)
  • Bump path-to-regexp and express in /install.ztnet (#593)
  • Bump body-parser and express in /install.ztnet (#571)
  • Added option to set sitename in admin panel (#605)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/sinamics/ztnet/compare/v0.7.1...0.7.2

Documentation

https://ztnet.network

Contributors to this release: @Msprg, @Ns2Kracy, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @tinola 🎉
